mapper.sql: mid, inprice, salprice, mname, type, t2.typename, descs, qualitydate, description, producefirm, readme, remark FROM medicine t1 LEFT JOIN medicinetype t2 ON t1.type = t2.id
mapper.select: INSERT INTO medicine (mid, inprice, salprice, mname, type, descs, qualitydate, description, producefirm, readme, remark) VALUES (#{mid},#{inprice},#{salprice},#{mname},#{type},#{descs},#{qualitydate},#{description},#{producefirm},#{readme},#{remark})

UPDATE medicine SET mid = #{mid}, inprice = #{inprice}, salprice = #{salprice}, mname = #{mname}, type = #{type}, descs = #{descs}, qualitydate = #{qualitydate}, description = #{description}, producefirm = #{producefirm}, readme = #{readme}, remark = #{remark} WHERE mid = #{mid}
